entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:06 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
